title: Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated, 1 Pack Mini Battery Powered Copper Wire Starry Fairy Lights for Bedroom, Christmas, Parties, Wedding, Centerpiece, Decoration (5m/16ft Warm White)
descriptions:

Add a touch of enchantment to your home with our Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights, perfectly designed for any occasion. These battery-operated, copper wire starry fairy lights are not only mesmerizing but also incredibly easy to use.

**Features:**

* 50 rice grain-sized LEDs that provide a warm and cozy glow
* 16ft long copper wire that's ultra-thin, bendable, and waterproof
* 360-degree viewing angle for maximum visual impact
* No heat problems or energy waste - our lights are energy-efficient and eco-friendly
* Suitable for various occasions: bedroom decoration, Christmas tree, parties, wedding centerpiece, or any other decorative purpose

**Benefits:**

* Easy to shape and mold the wire to fit your desired design
* Clear and small battery box that's easy to hide
* No heat problems - perfect for indoor use
* Waterproof design ensures durability in various environments
* Energy-efficient and eco-friendly

**What's Included:**

* 1 pack of Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights
* 3 AA batteries required (not included)

At Ariceleo, we're committed to providing our customers with the best products and services. Our after-sales service team is available to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have.

Don't miss out on this opportunity to add a touch of magic to your life. Order now and get ready to mesmerize your friends and family with these stunning fairy lights!
